name: 8 Ball Smash
description:
Looking for the ultimate multiplayer 8 BALL POOL experience? Take on opponents in epic HEAD-TO-HEAD matches while enjoying the thrills of 3D graphics and physics. Collect a wide assortment of cues to reign as king playing Fast Break pool or take down never-before-seen multiplayer POOL ROYALE tournaments. The time has arrived to join friends and forge new rivalries at the tables playing the BRAND NEW 8 Ball Smash pool game!

PLAY FAST BREAK
MORE games! FASTER action! EVERY shot counts! With Fast Break, there’s no downtime waiting for your opponent as you and your rival go HEAD TO HEAD playing simultaneously trying to clear the table in as few shots as possible. Every layout is different, while the player with the best strategy always WINS!

INTRODUCING POOL ROYALE
Stand above all others playing the truly unique POOL ROYALE, where you’ll take on 99 of your fiercest rivals in timed multiplayer pool challenges. Enter this fast-paced, winner-takes-all ROYALE-style game spread over three rounds where the aim is to score points faster than your opponents across a variety of game types. But be quick, because one of you will be eliminated with every shot. There are multiple rumbles you can enter each day and BIG instant rewards to play for. It’s time to reign as the multiplayer pool king playing POOL ROYALE.

GET REALISTIC PHYSICS FOR AN AUTHENTIC EXPERIENCE:
Though the tables are fantastical, the game play is genuine, and you won’t find a more authentic billiards experience than this! Put some English on the ball to make it curve, roll backwards, or even jump over another ball. You can do it on a real pool table, but can you do it playing 8 Ball Smash?

MASTER TRICK SHOT CHALLENGES:
Keen to prove yourself as the Master of the Cues? Improve your skills as a cue stick whizz tackling unique PUZZLES at the table along the way. No obstacle is impassable and no shot is impossible once you’ve collected your real-life PRO pool skills.

COLLECT MYTHICAL CUES:
Feel the might of more than 40 unique pool cues, each with their own SPECIAL FEATURES and upgrades to help you unleash extraordinary powers. Play games to complete your arsenal of pool cues and become an 8 ball pool legend.

So what are you waiting for? Pack your cue and rack ‘em up here in the 8 Ball Smash pool room!
